summary: Build path contains duplicate entry: 'src' for project 'org.osmdroid.google.sample.GoogleWrapperSample'

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. start eclipse ( version 4.2 juno) on windows PC. 2. svn checkout http://osmdroid.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ osmdroid-read-only 3. Import in eclipse (android - existing android code into workspace) and chose the local checked out directory of osmdroid-read-only as the root directory 4. STRANGE - I only see the following 2 projects org.osmdroid.google.sample.GoogleWrapperSample and org.osmdroid.MapActivity -> according to the HowToEclipse, i should see more projects - do you any ideas if this is a problem? 5. i tick the tickbox "copy into workspace" and get the following error message: "Build path contains duplicate entry: 'src' for project 'org.osmdroid.google.sample.GoogleWrapperSample' Reason: Build path contains duplicate entry: 'src' for project 'org.osmdroid.google.sample.GoogleWrapperSample'" there are the following entries in the error log: a) at 07:03: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Application does not have an active window at 2.3 (api 10)? Thanks in advance for your help! What is the expected output? What do you see instead? -> i would expect there to be a number of importable projects (4 altogether?) when i import, rather than just 2. Also i would expect to be able to import without errors occuring. can you help please? what am i doing wrong? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? -> i am using 3.08, i have a windows xp pc, i am using eclipse 4.2 Please provide any additional information below. Thanks
This is not a valid issue. Please ask questions on the mailing list.
